dmca.title: Blogger complains of blog repost, appropriation
dmca.body:
March 27, 2006 
Google, Inc. 
Atm: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy 
Mountain View, CA 94043 

To Whom It May Concern: 

1. From September 2005 until February 2006, I hosted a blog at http://afinetune.blogspot.com. In February 2006, I deleted the blog. The current author of the blog hosted at http://afinetune.blogspot.com is infringing on the copyright I hold on the posts I wrote when I was the author of that blog by reposting them at http://afinetune.blogspot.com and claiming they are his/her own. Specifically, I wrote the following posts: 
a. http://afinetune.blogspot.com/2005/09/see-ive-been-working-on-fine-tune-ive.html
b. http://afinetune.blogspot.com/2005/09/dont-ya-know-that-i-love-my-music-aint.html 
c. http://afinetune.blogspot.com/2005/09/you-cant-lose-your-cool-these-days-i.html 
d. http://afinetune.blogspot.com/2005/09/love-girl-who-holds-world-in-paper-cup.html 
e. http://afinetune.blogspot.com/2005/09/and-may-your-eyes-always-shine-bright.html 
f. http://afinetune.blogspot.com/2005/09/you-better-think-twice--about-leaving.html 

2. The posts found at the above addresses are posts I wrote word for word when I hosted my blog at that address. 

3. The e-mail address I can be contacted at is [private]@kc.rr.com 

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law 

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Sincerely, 
[private] 
[private] 
KANSAS CITY, MO 64111 
[private] 
[private]@KC.RR.COM
